trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of all [Import](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elements in a project.
Allows hosts to programmatically add a new [<Import>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tag to a project file being manipulated by the host.
A required string representing the name of the project file for the <Import> statement to be added.
For example, "myproject.csproj."
An optional string indicating whether the element is processed.
If `condition` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, then the specified <Import> tag is added, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, it is not.

Copies the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index of the target array.

The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import"></xref> objects that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
Copies the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.
Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import"></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Import> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Allows hosts to programmatically remove [<Import>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tags that are part of a project file being manipulated by the host.
Removing an import marks the project as dirty, which means that the project will be re-evaluated at some point during other operations on the project instance.
A string representing the name of the <Import> tag to remove from the project file.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ImportCollection"></xref>.
